column4: Can anyone tell me how to set domain name on this thing? I used the gui under network tools and it doesn't seem to have affected exim's call to DEBCONFdomainDEBCONF
depending on what you want, edit  /etc/mailname  and  /etc/hosts so that the first entry has the domain you want on the end
tell them to get a playstation ;) if they want to play games
will give it a shot. and thanks
